Camera - class jpo.Camera.
A class which holds information about the digital camera as seen by the filesystem
Camera() - Constructor for class jpo.Camera
Constructor to create a new Camera object.
CameraEditor - class jpo.CameraEditor.
This class creates a JFrame and then presents the user with the dialog to add pictures directly from the camera.

ChangeWindowInterface - interface jpo.ChangeWindowInterface.
This interface defines the methods that an object must implement if it wants to be able to receive requests from a ChangeWindowPopupMenu.
ChangeWindowPopupMenu - class jpo.ChangeWindowPopupMenu.
A class that generates a popup menu for a group node.
ChangeWindowPopupMenu(ChangeWindowInterface) - Constructor for class jpo.ChangeWindowPopupMenu
Creates a popup menu which allows the user to choose how he would like his window to be positioned and whether it should have decorations.
CleverJTree - class jpo.CleverJTree.
The is one of the main classes in the JPO application as it is an extended JTree that deals with most of the logic surrounding the collection and the user interactions with it.
CleverJTree(CleverJTreeInterface, SortableDefaultMutableTreeNode) - Constructor for class jpo.CleverJTree
Constructs a JTree.
CleverJTree.JpoTreeCellRenderer - class jpo.CleverJTree.JpoTreeCellRenderer.
Inner class that extends the DefaulTreeCellRenderer to provide customised icons to the tree nodes

subclass to determine if a popup Menu should be shown.

CleverJTree.MyTreeModelListener - class jpo.CleverJTree.MyTreeModelListener.
A helper class that implements the TreeModelListener.
CleverJTree.MyTreeModelListener() - Constructor for class jpo.CleverJTree.MyTreeModelListener
 
CleverJTreeInterface - interface jpo.CleverJTreeInterface.
This interface defines the method that an object must implement if it wants to create a CleverJTree.
